search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Zenkit (zenkit.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Zenkit can be found at this URL: [https://zenkit.com/pricing](https://zenkit.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.
